name: Equinox: A Sinner's Song
description:
Game #1 on the Game Dev League July Jam

Sometimes the world doesnt need another hero. Sometimes, what it needs is a monster." You are alone and maybe you are the last man alive. All you can think about is the horde of monsters after you in this post-apocalyptic world. In the end, there's no hope. The only way to find a bit of hope is to kill everyone in your way and push those demons back to where they belong.
